title: Is my computer crap?
body: I recently got a Acer computer which I upgraded from my laptop but when I join the champion select room I always seem to be the last to join and it's frustrating because I never get the champion I want anyone help me my specs are AMD RADEON R5 310 8 gb ram with AMD a6-6310 processor

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you on wi-fi? Could you try joining a game on a wired connection and letting me know if that helps.
Yes I am on wifi and It may be a bit difficult to use wired but if I get a chance I'll let you know it's so frustrating joining late and not getting my desired roles
